content: Investments STI ETF General Asked by AnonymousAsked on 29 Apr 2019Do you think it is wise to sell some shares in my portfolio?I currently own 114 units if STI ETF in my portfolio that is down by -$6.41. If i were to sell 100 units at $3.41, would i be making a loss? The minimum fee is SGD 10 or 0.12%.?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 29 Apr 2019Yes.It is already in negative, if you sell, you not only lose capital but also incur transaction costs. This puts you further in the red.Why are you considering to sell it? If possible, just hold it till it breaks even at least.0 comments1
